channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 16:28 The threat of use of the copecreal application
item.description: 🟠 16:28 The threat of use of the copecreal application This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
